metadata.symbol: Tokenized Right-to-Use to the property withing Avatar Eco Lodge
metadata.title: AEL-RTU - Villa 6 - Week 48
metadata.Right-to-Use: Holder of this token has the right to use Villa No.6 with Avatar Private Reserve for every week 48 in years 2022 - 2041. This right could be applied for family, friends, or be sold on behalf of the holder, in that case, the holder pays a utility fee of 20 USD + annual inflation since 2022 per day for a unit. Alternatively, the holder could offer the accommodation to the Avatar reservation system to get 50% from a potential sale, paid in KAU directly to the same address containing this token. The holder must offer the accommodation to the Avatar reservation system no late than 3 weeks before the right-to-use date. All information regarding reservation system and utility fees could be found onÂ www.avatarecolodge.com.
metadata.subtitle: Avatar Eco Lodge Right-to-Use Villa No.6 for every week 48 in years 2022 - 2041
metadata.name: AEL-RTU - Villa 6 - Week 48
